title: CUSHAU
typeOfFood: International, Raw, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Bakery, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafeteria serving vegan cakes, fresh made-in-house juices, macaroon sandwiches, salads and macaroons. Working with diversity in a wide space (150 sq m ) where accessibility is a must both for mothers with babies and customers with any kind of disability. Sign language and English.
